Class Rhino

  • java.lang.Object
    • Rhino

  • public class Rhino
extends java.lang.Object
    Instances of this class are monitoring data for a single rhino.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Rhino(java.lang.String n, int y, int m, char g)
      Constructor: a new rhino with name n, birth year y, birth month m, and gender g.
      Rhino(java.lang.String n, int y, int m, char g, int tag, Rhino ma, Rhino pa)
      Constructor: a new rhino with name n, birth year y, birth month m, gender g, identifier id, mother ma, and father pa.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Rhino

        public Rhino(java.lang.String n,
             int y,
             int m,
             char g)
        Constructor: a new rhino with name n, birth year y, birth month m, and gender g. Its parents are unknown, and it has no children. Precondition: n's length is gt 0. m is in the range 1..12. g is either `M' (for male) or `F' (for female)

      • Rhino

        public Rhino(java.lang.String n,
             int y,
             int m,
             char g,
             int tag,
             Rhino ma,
             Rhino pa)
        Constructor: a new rhino with name n, birth year y, birth month m, gender g, identifier id, mother ma, and father pa. Precondition: n's length is gt 0. m is in the range 1 .. 12. g is either `M' (for male) or `F' (for female). tag ge 0 (or -1 if untagged). ma and pa may not be null.

      • addMother

        public void addMother(Rhino p)
        Add p as the mother of this rhino. Precondition: p is not null, p is a female, and this rhino's mother is currently null.

      • addFather

        public void addFather(Rhino p)
        Add p as the father of this rhino. Precondition: p is not null, p is a male, and this rhino's father is currently null.
